long_description: When you don't want to carry a bag, but you can't fit it all in your pocket, you need the Timbuk2 Skinny Wallet. This durable, super-organized clutch puts everything you need at your fingertips. Slim, clutch-style wallet has a removable wrist strap and a flap that closes with secure magnetic grommets. Multiple internal slots and pockets hold cards, ID, cash and a checkbook. Dedicated coin pocket; clear ID pocket. Timbuk2 Skinny Wallet for women features a quick-access outer pocket for metro cards, bus passes, tickets, etc.
short_description: When you don't want to carry a bag, but you can't fit it all in your pocket, you need the Timbuk2 Skinny Wallet. This durable, super-organized clutch puts everything you need at your fingertips.
